title: Rewarded Tier Less Than Earned
body:
Client says I have been awarded a tier less than what I did earn for the 2016 season. Is this a client bug, or is this a system bug?

--------------------------------------------------------------------

1. Opened up my client to install the new patches for 6.22 at 9:30AM -CT.

2. Opened up my profile, no rewards earned, I know they won't be given for awhile.

3. Went to Leagues Tab.

4. My Leagues Sidebar Box:
    * Diamond V 24LP

5. 2016 League Tier Rewards Box: 
    * Tier Reward Earned: Platinum

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(https://i.gyazo.com/85a5d3db8998b4175285b45db0d13da6.jpg)

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
I spoke with some of our game team and it looks like this is a visual bug that's showing your 2015 season rewards/placement. Thanks for bringing this to my attention so we can take a further look into it.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Thanks for the heads-up! And no problem.

 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

I just noticed i have the same problem here, i ve finished as diamond but its says i ll rececive nothing
"Play in upcoming 2017 season to earn ranked tier award "  u w8 mate ? lol
Same here, Plat V and gold rewards tier. I wonder if it's because of MMR?

When the 2016 ranked (season 5) ended you had been awarded a platinum border, summoner icon, etc.

Soon, when you get the new rewards from the ranked season 6, it will say this:
2017 league tier rewards: 
Tier reward earned:
Diamond V, border, icon etc.

atleast I think that's what is going on.

So the thing you see still has to be updated to next year/season and i think that will happen after everyone has received their rewards.
I think this is correct, spoke with a bunch of my friends who all have their previous season's rewards showing.
I hope, thanks for letting us know. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
The same thing happened to me i finished gold but i have silver rewards so I'm mildly terrified

This happened to me on my Latin America North account too.
http://imgur.com/a/zqAJa
I finished Plat V this season but the client says I'll get Gold rewards.
I was going to submit a ticket directly to Riot Support, but seeing as another person has this problem too, we should wait and see if they answer via the forums.

I just wanted to say that I am experiencing the same issues and really appreciate someone looking into it! Best of luck in preseason everyone!
 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I do not have any of this showing. It still looks like the 2016 ranked season page, I have not been awarded anything, nor have do I have a page showing what is coming.

Hey! 

To me it says I have no rewards and I am unranked. I ended uo this season plat V and was gold 2 last season. Why does all my friends have these rewards and I dont have them yet ?

Same goes for me lol

Ended up diamond and getting no rewards kappa 

Is it a bug?
Same, I'm plat V and it says I'll receive Gold rewards =_=
